Plot: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.
Title: Dungeons & Dragons
Actors: Jeremy Irons, Bruce Payne, Justin Whalin, Marlon Wayans
tomatoConsensus: Critics say this movie has a cheap look and is badly directed. Despite the presence of talented actors, the performances are really bad, and additionally, some people are offended at Marlon Wayans' character, calling it a racist throwback to black stereotypes.
